body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids            Become a Junior Ranger Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect national parks. You can earn your own Junior Ranger badge by completing the Theodore Roosevelt Island Junior Ranger book.           TRACK Trails Use this online journal to keep track of the miles you’ve hiked. You’ll also find fun activities to try while you’re walking. You can earn prizes by completing hikes on other trails.           Become a Webranger Are you and your family planning a trip to other National Parks? Do you want to explore more of your National Parks online? Become a WebRanger.           Let's Move Outside Kids need at least one hour of exercise every day to stay physically and mentally fit. What better way to do that than by playing outside in your national park?
title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: For Kids
